message: Initiated prefixes, source, and suffixes at the start of the program. Added updatePattern method for code readability. Added constructor so updatePattern gets called at instantiation.

added: private String prefixes = "", source = "", suffixes = "", pattern = "";
Pattern p = Pattern.compile(this.prefixes + this.source + this.suffixes, this.modifiers);
deleted: private String prefixes, source, suffixes, pattern = "";
this.source = this.source != null ? this.source + value : value;
Pattern p = Pattern.compile(this.prefixes + this.source + this.suffixes, this.modifiers);
